lead_paragraph: A Kansas State student was cited for disorderly conduct for body-checking a Kansas player during an on-court celebration after the Wildcats’ upset win over the visiting eighth-ranked Jayhawks.

headline.main: Kansas State Student Cited for Conduct

snippet: A Kansas State student was cited for disorderly conduct for body-checking a Kansas player during an on-court celebration after the Wildcats’ upset win over the visiting eighth-ranked Jayhawks.
